verses.verse: For the Chief Musician. A Psalm of David. In thee, O Jehovah<WH3068>, do I take refuge<WH2620>; Let me never<WH408> be put to shame<WH954>: Deliver<WH6403> me in thy righteousness<WH6666>.
Bow down<WH5186> thine ear<WH241> unto me<WH5337>; Deliver me speedily<WH4120>: Be thou to me a strong<WH4581> rock<WH6697>, A house<WH1004> of defence<WH4686> to save me<WH3467>.
For thou art my rock<WH5553> and my fortress<WH4686>; Therefore for thy name<WH8034>'s sake lead<WH5148> me and guide me<WH5095>.
Pluck me out<WH3318> of the net<WH7568> that<WH2098> they have laid privily<WH2934> for me<WH4581>; For thou art my stronghold.
Into thy hand<WH3027> I commend<WH6485> my spirit<WH7307>: Thou hast redeemed<WH6299> me<WH3068>, O Jehovah, thou God<WH410> of truth<WH571>.
I hate<WH8130> them that regard<WH8104> lying<WH7723> vanities<WH1892>; But I trust<WH982> in Jehovah<WH3068>.
I will be glad<WH1523> and rejoice<WH8055> in thy lovingkindness<WH2617>; For thou hast seen<WH7200> my affliction<WH6040>: Thou hast known<WH3045> my soul<WH5315> in adversities<WH6869>;
And thou hast not shut me up<WH5462> into the hand<WH3027> of the enemy<WH341>; Thou hast set<WH5975> my feet<WH7272> in a large place<WH4800>.
Have mercy<WH2603> upon me<WH3068>, O Jehovah, for I am in distress<WH6887>: Mine eye<WH5869> wasteth<WH6244> away with grief<WH3708>, yea<WH5315>, my soul and my body<WH990>.

For my life<WH2416> is spent<WH3615> with sorrow<WH3015>, And my years<WH8141> with sighing<WH585>: My strength<WH3581> faileth<WH3782> because of mine iniquity<WH5771>, And my bones<WH6106> are wasted away<WH6244>.

Because of all mine adversaries<WH6887> I am become a reproach<WH2781>, Yea<WH7934>, unto my neighbors exceedingly<WH3966>, And a fear<WH6343> to mine acquaintance<WH3045>: They that did see<WH7200> me without<WH2351> fled from me<WH5074>.
I am forgotten<WH7911> as a dead man<WH4191> out of mind<WH3820>: I am like a broken<WH6> vessel<WH3627>.

For I have heard<WH8085> the defaming<WH1681> of many<WH7227>, Terror<WH4032> on every side<WH5439>: While they took counsel<WH3245> together<WH3162> against me<WH2161>, they devised to take away<WH3947> my life<WH5315>.
But I trusted<WH982> in thee<WH3068>, O Jehovah: I said<WH559>, Thou art my God<WH430>.
My times<WH6256> are in thy hand<WH3027>: Deliver<WH5337> me from the hand<WH3027> of mine enemies<WH341>, and from them that persecute me<WH7291>.
Make thy face<WH6440> to shine<WH215> upon thy servant<WH5650>: Save<WH3467> me in thy lovingkindness<WH2617>.
Let me not be put to shame<WH954>, O Jehovah<WH3068>; For I have called<WH7121> upon thee<WH7563>: Let the wicked be put to shame<WH954>, let them be silent<WH1826> in Sheol<WH7585>.
Let the lying<WH8267> lips<WH8193> be dumb<WH481>, Which speak<WH1696> against the righteous<WH6662> insolently<WH6277>, With pride<WH1346> and contempt<WH937>.

Oh how great<WH7227> is thy goodness<WH2898>, Which thou hast laid up<WH6845> for them that fear<WH3373> thee<WH6466>, Which thou hast wrought for them that take refuge<WH2620> in thee<WH1121>, Before the sons of men<WH120>!

In the covert<WH5643> of thy presence<WH6440> wilt thou hide<WH5641> them from the plottings<WH7407> of man<WH376>: Thou wilt keep them secretly<WH6845> in a pavilion<WH5521> from the strife<WH7379> of tongues<WH3956>.
Blessed <WH1288> be Jehovah<WH3068>; For he hath showed me his marvellous<WH6381> lovingkindness<WH2617> in a strong<WH4692> city<WH5892>.

As for me<WH559>, I said in my haste<WH2648>, I am cut off<WH1629> from before<WH5048> thine eyes<WH5869>: Nevertheless<WH403> thou heardest<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of my supplications<WH8469> When I cried unto thee<WH7768>.
Oh love<WH157> Jehovah<WH3068>, all ye his saints<WH2623>: Jehovah<WH3068> preserveth<WH5341> the faithful<WH539>, And plentifully<WH3499> rewardeth<WH7999> him that dealeth<WH6213> proudly<WH1346>.
Be strong<WH553>, and let your heart<WH3824> take courage<WH2388>, All ye that hope<WH3176> in Jehovah<WH3068>.
